caseTitle: The Commissioner of Income Tax, & another v. M/s Pak Saudi Fertilizer Ltd. thr. its M.D.
tagline: Discussion: (1) Relationship of principal and agent and distinction between a contract of sale and a contract of agency. (2) Section 50 (4), 80-C & 62 of the Income Tax Ordinance 1979 & Section 19 & 20 of Sale of Goods Act 1930. (3) Section 182, 188, 211 & 222 of Contract Act.
